description: The Sarawak State Museum is the oldest museum in Borneo. It was established in 1888 and opened in 1891 in a purpose-built building in Kuching, Sarawak
location: Pengarah Jabatan Muzium Negeri Sarawak, Jalan Tun Abang Haji Openg, 93566, Kuching, Sarawak  93000
name: Sarawak Museum

description: Main Bazaar is one of Kuchings oldest streets (dating back to 1864

description: Carpenter Street is an old street that runs from Jalan Tun Abang Haji Openg, where the General Post Office is located
name: Carpenter Street, Kuching

description: located near the Kuching Waterfront and is housed in a building that was originally the Chinese Chamber of Commerce, built in 1912
name: Chinese History Museum

description: Kuching Waterfront is the esplanade on the south bank of the Sarawak River. In the 19th century, this area had warehouses and wharfs and was very busy with ships coming in to dock.
name: Waterfront, Kuching

description: The Square Tower is located on the Kuching Waterfront and is a white cube-like structure in the shape of a fortress
name: Square Tower, Kuching

description: One of the famous landmarks around the main town area is the Cat Statue which is located opposite the Riverside Majestic
location: Riverside Majestic Hotel on Jalan Tunku Abdul Rahman and Jalan Abell.
name: Kuching Cat Statue, Sarawak
